SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceShip

    Package Description
    SpaceInvaders.GUI  
    SpaceInvaders.Objects  

    • Uses of SpaceShip in SpaceInvaders.GUI

      Methods in SpaceInvaders.GUI that return SpaceShip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpaceShip SpaceInvaders.getSpaceShip()
      returns the current spaceShip from game

    • Uses of SpaceShip in SpaceInvaders.Objects

      Methods in SpaceInvaders.Objects with parameters of type SpaceShip 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Suicidal.damageDone(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      damaged done to the spaceship each times the suicidal colides with her.
      void FireShooter.damageDone(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      Damage done to spaceShip from the Fire shooter.
      void Enemy.damageDone(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      depending of the enemy the spaceship gets damaged, to be implemented by the classes that extend Enemy
      void Destroyer.damageDone(SpaceShip spaceShip) 
      void Boss.damageDone(SpaceShip spaceShip) 
      void Suicidal.move(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      Depending where the spaceship is the suicidal moves towards her trying to collide.
      void Shot.move(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      Depending of the spaceship the shots will get their own path.
      void FireShooter.move(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      Movement by the fire shooter, stars slowly going down while chasing the spaceship and firing at her.
      void Enemy.move(SpaceShip spaceShip)
      Move enemy
      void Destroyer.move(SpaceShip spaceShip) 
      void Boss.move(SpaceShip spaceShip) 
      void Protection.performAction(SpaceShip ship)
      sets a protection to the spaceship, immune to damage, and sets the availability to false
      void Life.performAction(SpaceShip ship)
      increases the life of the spaceship and turns the current life bonus off.
      void Bonus.performAction(SpaceShip ship)
      performs an action depending of the bonus
